body:
You didn't mention the Amazon instance you ran this test on. The tests take a lot of CPU, and this is something that cloud providers love to over provision.

You can try increasing the timeouts with this setting
```
env GO_TEST_TIMEOUT_SCALE=1
```
I'm going to close this issue for the moment as I don't think there is anything to be done here. Please feel free to reopen if you are unable to resolve the problem.
